creator: milamber@apache.org
text: Adds the ability for the Response Time Graph listener to save format settings in the jmx file. (And restore the format settings)

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1613102
Log:
Adds the ability for the Response Time Graph listener to save/restore format settings in/from the jmx file.
Bugzilla Id: 56769
